title: 1931년 Ashe 사건
summary: 미국 North Carolina, NC 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Ashe. 판결일: 1931-05-27. 법원: Supreme Court of North Carolina.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Ervin F. Ashe v. Southern Railway Company, Joe Daugherty and W. H. Michael.
**판결일**: 1931-05-27
**법원**: Supreme Court of North Carolina
**관할**: North Carolina, NC

**판사**: OukiaM

## 변호인


Doyle D. Alley, A. Hall J ohnston and Alley & Alley for plaintiff.
, 
G. K. Hughes and J ones & Ward for defendants.


## 인용

- 158 S.E. 924
- 201 N.C. 823

## 판결문 요약

The plaintiff brought suit to recover damages for personal injury alleged to have been caused by the negligence of the defendants in the operation of a train of the Southern Railway Company. At the close of the plaintiff's evidence the action was dismissed as in case of nonsuit. After careful examination of the evidence and of the briefs filed on behalf of plaintiff and defendant, we are convinced that the plaintiff is not entitled to the recovery of damages. The judgment dismissing the action is therefore
Affirmed....
